inb370.asgn1
Interface IHiringGame

public interface IHiringGame

Abstract representation of the Hiring Problem also known as the Secretary Problem. Wikipedia problem description You need to create a class called HiringGame which implements this interface. Your class will be called by the provided GUI to actually run the game.

Version:
1.0
Author:
INB370

Method Detail

newGame

void newGame(int maxApplicants,
             java.util.Random random)
             throws HiringException
Initializes a new game clearing any previous game state. The new game initialization involves creating maxApplicant number of applicants each with a unique id and quality score obtained from the provided java.util.Random object.

Parameters:
maxApplicants - a positive integer number of applicants to consider
random - a non-null java.util.Random number generator
Throws:
HiringException - thrown when invalid arguments are supplied

getNextApplicant

Applicant getNextApplicant()
                           throws HiringException
Returns the next applicant to be considered. If the final applicant has been reached, it is automatically accepted. The applicants are interviewed sequentially in random order with each interview order being equally likely. This method rejects the current applicant and returns the next. Rejected applicants cannot be recalled; therefore, each applicant is returned at most once by this method.

Returns:
A unique applicant to be considered.
Throws:
HiringException - thrown when the game has not been started or an applicant has already been selected

isAccepted

boolean isAccepted()
                   throws HiringException
Returns if the player has accepted an applicant or not.

Returns:
true iff an applicant has been accepted (see getNextApplicant() for automatic acceptance conditions).
Throws:
HiringException - thrown when the game has not been started

acceptApplicant

void acceptApplicant()
                     throws HiringException
Accept the current applicant.

Throws:
HiringException - thrown when the game has not been started or an applicant has already been accepted

isBestApplicant

boolean isBestApplicant()
                        throws HiringException
Returns if the player has won.

Returns:
Returns true iff the accepted applicant has the highest quality score of all the applicants in the current game.
Throws:
HiringException - thrown when the game has not been started or an applicant has not been accepted

getBestApplicant

Applicant getBestApplicant()
                           throws HiringException
Returns the best applicant

Returns:
Returns the applicant with the highest quality score of all the applicants in the current game.
Throws:
HiringException - thrown when the game has not been started or an applicant has not been accepted
